item.title: nikoladu
item.dc:creator: wcmckee
item.description:
Nikoladu

Script to take json object of ministry of education jobs and create Nikola blog posts - rst and meta files.

In [1]:
#import nikola

import requests
import json
import pandas
In [ ]:
In [2]:
opedu = open('/home/wcmckee/github/wcmckee.com/output/minedujobs/index.json', 'r')
In [3]:
minjob = opedu.read()
In [4]:
dicminj = json.loads(minjob)
In [5]:
ldic = len(dicminj)
In [ ]:
In [7]:
catlis = list()

loclis = list()
datlis = list()
jobti = list()
In [ ]:
In [8]:
numdic = dict()
In [ ]:
In [9]:
for ldi in range(ldic):
    dicjob = dict()
    catedi = (dicminj[str(ldi)]['Category'])
    locdi = (dicminj[str(ldi)]['Location'])
    datdi = (dicminj[str(ldi)]['Date Advertised'])
    pandatz = pandas.to_datetime(datdi)
    pdate = pandatz.date()
    titdi = (dicminj[str(ldi)]['Job Title'])
    
    jobref = (dicminj[str(ldi)]['Job Reference'])
    jorefd = jobref[4:]
    #print (jorefd)
    
    skildi = (dicminj[str(ldi)]['lidocend'])
    
    #for ski in skildi:
        #print (ski)
        #for sk in ski:
            #print (sk)
    #print (titdi + '\n' + skildi)
            
            
    
    opmetf = open('/home/wcmckee/minstryofedu/posts/' + jorefd + '.meta', 'w')
    opmetf.write(jorefd + '\n' + jorefd + '\n' + str(pdate) + ' ' + str('09:00:00') + '\n' + catedi + ', ' + locdi)
    opmetf.close()
    
    oprstfi = open('/home/wcmckee/minstryofedu/posts/' + jorefd + '.rst', 'w')
    oprstfi.write(titdi)
    for ski in skildi:
        #print (ski)
        #for sk in ski:
        #    print (sk)
        oprstfi.write(str(ski))
    
    oprstfi.close()



    dicjob.update({'Category' : catedi, 'Date Advertised' : str(pdate), 'Job Title' : titdi,
    'Location' : locdi, 'Job Reference' : jobref})
    
    numdic.update({ldi : dicjob})
    #numdic.update({ldi : dicjob})
    
    loclis.append(locdi)
    datlis.append(datdi)
    jobti.append(titdi)
    
    nedicf = dicjob.copy()
    nedicf.update(nedicf)
    
    numdic.update({ldi : nedicf})
    
    #if 'education' in catedi:
    #    print (catedi)
In [11]:
allpda = list()
In [ ]:
In [12]:
for dal in datlis:
    allpdata = pandas.to_datetime(dal)
    allpda.append(allpdata)
In [15]:
datsli = list(set(datlis))

import arrow

panlis = list()

for dalz in datsli:
    print (dalz)
    panlis.append(pandas.to_datetime(dalz))

Read Min Job

Python script to read the json file generated from minedujob.

The key 'lidocend' is good things to have for the job. It is a series of ['blahbhal'],

item.title: educounts
item.dc:creator: wcmckee
item.description:
In [1]:
import bs4
import requests
import dominate
from dominate.tags import *
import os
import shutil
import json
from urlparse import urlparse
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
In [2]:
eceall = requests.get('https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz')
In [3]:
#eceall.text
In [4]:
edcountz = bs4.BeautifulSoup(eceall.text)
In [5]:
edu = edcountz.findAll('a')
In [6]:
taglisz = list()
In [7]:
tagliz = list()
In [8]:
gidict = dict()
In [9]:
for ed in edu:
    #print ed.text.replace(' ', '-')
    #print ed.attrs['href']
    #print ed.text[:22]
    gied = ed.text
    gifz = gied.replace(' ', '-')
    giflow = gifz.lower()
    gidict.update({giflow[:12] : ed.attrs['href']})
    o = urlparse(ed.attrs['href'])
    #change this path so that each element of the 
    #path can be used as TAGS
    #
    #print o.path
    #tapen = (o.path.replace('/', ', ')[1:])
    tapen = (o.path[1:])
    #gidict.update({ed.attrs['href'] : o.path[1:]})
    #print [tagz.strip() for tagz in tagz.split(',')]
    tagliz.append([tapen.strip() for tapen in tapen.split(',')])
In [9]:
In [10]:
json.dumps(gidict)

In [ ]:

item.title: educount
item.dc:creator: wcmckee
item.description:
ece-display: Education Counts

Python script to remix educationcounts nz govt site.

Ministery Of Education.

Display more info in one page.

Read HTML for .xlc files and download to folder

Scrape links for excel files - download excel files to folder.

Remove excel files and instead display as more friendly json object and pandas dataframe for display.

        <article class="page-list">
            <div class="row-fluid">
            <ul>
              <li class="span4">
                <a id="region" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region" class="item" title="Know Your Region">
                  <h3>Know your region</h3>
                  <p>An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.</p>
                </a>
              </li>

<li class="span4">
                <a id="school" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school" class="item" title="Find a School in NZ">
                  <h3>Find a school</h3>
                  <p>An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.</p>
                </a>
              </li>

<li class="span4">
                <a id="ece" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els" class="item" title="Find an Early Learning Service in NZ">
                  <h3>Find an Early Learning Service</h3>
                  <p>An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.</p>
                </a>
              </li>


<li class="span4">
                <a id="topics" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics" class="item" title="Topics">
                  <h3>Topics</h3>
                  <p>Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.</p>
                </a>
              </li>
<li class="span4">
                <a id="indicators" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators" class="item" title="Indicators">
                  <h3>Indicators</h3>
                  <p>Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.</p>
                </a>
              </li>
<li class="span4">
                <a id="pubs" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications" class="item" title="Publications">
                  <h3>Publications</h3>
                  <p>Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.</p>
                </a>
              </li>
<li class="span4">
                <a id="stats" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics" class="item" title="Statistics">
                  <h3>Statistics</h3>
                  <p>Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.</p>
                </a>
              </li>
<li class="span4">
                <a id="services" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services" class="item" title="Data Services">
                  <h3>Data Services</h3>
                  <p>Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.</p>
                </a>
              </li>
            </ul>
          </div>

An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services

Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services

Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Statistics

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services

Data Services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications

Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Statistics

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Statistics

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Statistics

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications

Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications

Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data Services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics

Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data Services
